subject: Re: Fwd: New optional extras - website update

Confirming the requested updates have completed and can be reviewed here: https://withstella.co.uk/legal/

- done updating the dates
- done updating the url to https://withstella.co.uk/legal/
please check. ty

+15mins

Hi @glen I understand the request as the following:

On page: https://withstella.co.uk/legal-draft/

1. Update the dates to Oct 30, 2023 shown in the screenshot
2. Once updated, make the page live (update URL as well)

Hi Team,

The UK team have confirmed this is now live. Can you please update the after date to Oct 30, 2023 and then please publish?

Thanks

Anita

Anita Manchester

Head of Marketing

m 0404 968 482

w http://stellainsurance.com.au/

Hi Anita,

We have added the labels for the downloadable PDFs including the old and new pdfs:
  1. Policy Documents (Oct 10, 2022 - Oct 10, 2023)
  2. Policy Documents (After Oct 10, 2023)

Here's the link: 
https://withstella.co.uk/legal-draft/

Let us know if you have further instructions.

Hi @ricaR following updates are done, please check

Added the labels for the downloadable PDFs including the old and new pdfs:

  2. Policy Documents (After Oct 10, 2023)

Time: +15mins

@jaime please see below email thread that Anita is referring to:
"Hi Anita

Thanks for the update.   Happy with the changes however I can’t see that the old excess and key documents are still present on the webpage, unless I’m missing something?   We are going to need to display both the old provider and new provider documents for a 12 month run off period.

So for example,  I’d imagine it would need to say something like ‘if you purchased your policy between 10th October 2022 and the 10th October 2023, these are the policy documents’ and ‘if you purchased your policy after 10th October 2023 these are your documents’ or something along them lines. "

Hi Team,

Please see below.
Can you please make the necessary amendments.

Thanks
Anita

Get Outlook for iOS

Hi @ricaR done updating legal-draft page, Please check Thanks

https://withstella.co.uk/legal-draft/

Screenshot


Time: +15mins

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Jaime Velasquez

full_threads.body:
Hi team,

Hope you're well.
Are you able to make the changes below to the UK site. If you can make them in a test page for review before we push love that would be great.

Thanks
Anita

Get Outlook for iOS
From: Dan Dobson <Dan.Dobson@freedomservicesgroup.co.uk>
Sent: Monday, October 9, 2023 6:26 pm
To: Karen Hogg <Karen.hogg@withstella.co.uk>; natalie@withstella.co <natalie@withstella.co>; Anita Manchester <anita.manchester@stellainsurance.com.au>
Cc: Dan Holland <dan.holland@freedomservicesgroup.co.uk>
Subject: New optional extras - website update

Hi All

We will soon be replacing our existing Key Cover and Excess Protection provider from ABS to Freedom Guernsey. I believe the plan is to change Excess protection over on the 16th October, with Key Cover hopefully launching the week after.

In preparation for this I have attached the new policy wording and IPID documents. Would it be possible for someone to arrange this webpage https://withstella.co.uk/legal/ to be updated to show the new documents please? Confirmation of the actual live date will be sent once it has been confirmed.

The documents for the current products will also need to remain on the webpage for the next 12 months.

Thanks


Dan Dobson

 Technical Support Manager


freedombrokers.co.uk

BizSpace | Cheadle Place | Cheadle | Cheshire | SK8 2JX
